director.name: 阿依孜汗·卡斯木别 Aizhana Kassymbek

introduction: Going through a vulnerable teenage period and parents' divorce, Camilla's naive world is falling apart. Trying to manage with her new reality and uncontrollable desires, she decides to escape to a quiet place with her friend Raushan. There she hopes to find a little love that she desperately needs.源自：https://siwff.or.kr/eng/addon/00000001/program_view.asp?m_idx=103754&QueryYear=2023&c_idx=373&QueryType=B&QueryStep=2
